entry.title: And I don't wanna go home yet
entry.summary:
Author: LuiGarMir

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,390Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: When Clark met Bruce, he didn’t think much of the man. Well, no. He’d had thoughts—a lot of them having to do with his chiseled jaw and strong shoulders—but he hadn’t seen past Batman’s dark, gloomy, unknowable persona.The man—barely a young adult when they met—had been polite and deadly efficient, but also cold and distant.Clark, a journalist at heart, wanted to know more about him, but Superman understood how precious secrecy and privacy were. So… He gave Batman some space.It took him years to discover the man’s civilian name. And it just so happened to be around the same time both men started getting closer. Or it was maybe the reason they got close at all.

entry.title: There's Something So Lonesome About You
entry.summary:
Author: hoeforhoran28

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,609Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 535

Summary: "Your identity was supposed to be a secret. Not only to protect yourself (and probably least importantly yourself) but others. Your family, your friends. Everyone who stood a chance at being ripped apart by your decision to go out there everyday and put yourself in the crossfire.Not that Bruce had anyone to protect, besides Alfred. But it was still a fucking given."Or: Bruce has been Batman for two years and if he knew anything, it was that when you don a mask, you don it for a reason. An important reason that just doesn't seem to be as important to the rest of the League as it is to him. This is going to be a story about Bruce being coaxed into allowing others behind his carefully built walls. (Specifically one person.)

entry.title: claw your way out
entry.summary:
Author: Dragoneisha

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,256Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 30

Summary: Gift for waveoftheocean for the Winter Gift Exchange.**Superman opens his eyes and he is not in his body, nor his world. This is not uncommon, but it is rarely welcome, especially when there's magic involved. This time, though, he's a dragon, so... it could really be a lot worse.-Batman finds the new, imposter Superman to be too familiar and too strange to abide for long. Yes, that's clearly an imposter - he talks wrong. (He will not be considering why he has Superman's speech patterns committed to memory.) Juggling this and the sudden, unexplained disappearance of one Clark Kent, the responsibility foisted upon him by Superman's favorite reporter, leaves him with too many mysteries to handle alone.

entry.title: It's Not One
entry.summary:
Author: kingsarah

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,143Chapters: 2/9Kudos: 28

Summary: One name written over a heart tying two people together. One pair of soulmates trying to figure out what that means.Clark and Bruce have finally come together and accepted each other as soulmates, but it’s not happily ever after yet. One thing after another causes turbulence in their budding relationship. Just because they are soulmates doesn’t mean the path is smooth. But maybe it’s not one thing that defines a relationship, but innumerable little actions over time.Sequel to Redamancy.

entry.title: Baternity Leave
entry.summary:
Author: Gentlefolk_fica

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,941Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 336

Summary: Disbelieving what he was looking at, he turned back to the computer across the cold stone expanse.“Computer- analyze results.”The computer downloaded the ultrasound data and cross-referenced it with his other symptoms.“Additional heartbeat detected. Fetal life form present. Estimated: 7-8 weeks gestation”Bruce blinked again. Ever the logical one when faced with a crisis, he asked: “Any additional data?”“Kryptonian DNA detected.”That’s when Bruce gave himself permission to panic.

entry.title: Family of the Year...Because No One Else Entered the Contest
entry.summary:
Author: Eboni_A

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,833Chapters: 17/18Kudos: 406

Summary: Clark Kent and Bruce Wayne are officially married and the adoptive parents of five very active teenagers: Conner, 16, new to families and basic human interaction; Robin, 15, on his way to the Olympic Trials for the US Men’s Gymnastics Team; Jason, 14, a child star about to take on the biggest movie role of his career; Tim, 13, training to be more than a back-up hero; and Damian, 12, ready to step into his father’s work boots and cowl.With their time divided between Gotham and New York City, Clark and Bruce struggle to remain a sane, united front while drowning in the chaotic drama that is teenagers left to their own devices when Jason’s birth mother wants to become a permanent fixture in his life, Robin’s behavior becomes erratic after a celebration turns tragic, Tim fears the feelings he has for Conner, Conner doubts his acceptance into the family, and Talia Al Ghul threatens to visit.For some unions, love just isn’t enough to keep it all together. It’s Clark and Bruce against the world, but can they succeed, when it seems that even their own children are on the opposing side?

entry.summary:
Author: Nyszu

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,980Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 89

Summary: Bruce has never told Clark about his uncle Philip. He didn’t need to. He cut off contact a long time ago, and half of his children didn’t even know he existed.But of course, the day Clark and he celebrate their one-year anniversary, his uncle had to ruin the night and expose to Clark how broken Bruce was.It had lasted too long, Bruce thought. Of all the reasons Clark had to leave him, this one would surely be it.
